questions.question: What is the predominant color of the main body of the device?

What type of connector is visible at the end of the cable?

How many visible connectors are present on the entire cable assembly?

Describe the overall design style of the device: simple or complex?
What is the apparent length of the visible portion of the cable?

Describe the discernible quality of the cable's construction; is it flimsy or robust?

What is the general appearance of the cable's connectors; are they sleek or bulky?
